sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Create from "../ticket/Create"; import logo from "./pmint.svg"; const Header = () => { const history = useHistory(); // const [colorTheme, setTheme] = useDarkMode(); const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [user, setUser] = useState( JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")) || "" ); function logout() { localStorage.clear(); history.push("/login"); } useEffect(() => { if(localStorage.getItem('user') === null) { history.push('/login') } else { return true } }) return (
Logo should be here?
Settings logout()} className="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 w-full float-left " role="menuitem" > Sign out
Dashboard Tickets History Admin
Dashboard Tickets History Admin
Open user menu {user ? user.firstName[0] : ""}
{user.firstName}
{user.email}
Settings Sign out
); }; export default Header;
